title: Problem with analyzing new video
body: *Ubuntu 16.04, with an Anaconda Env, & DeepLabCut 2.08* I tried to analyze new video, but there are some errors as follows. I think there is a problem near "FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2]" because there is a folder whose name is "iteration-0" not "iteration-1", but I couldn't understand why "iteration-1" is specified. --------------------------------------------------------------------------- In [7]: deeplabcut.analyze_videos(config_path,['/media/dlc/Data/Data/TurtleBehavData/E09/HV_Grating/2012.06.22-E09-avi'], shuff ...: le=1, save_as_csv=True, videotype='.avi') FileNotFoundError Traceback (most recent call last) /home/dlc/anaconda3/envs/dlc/lib/python3.6/site-packages/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_tensorflow/predict_videos.py in analyze_videos(config, videos, videotype, shuffle, trainingsetindex, gputouse, save_as_csv, destfolder, cropping) 129 try: --> 130 dlc_cfg = load_config(str(path_test_config)) 131 except FileNotFoundError: /home/dlc/anaconda3/envs/dlc/lib/python3.6/site-packages/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_tensorflow/config.py in load_config(filename) 55 def load_config(filename = "pose_cfg.yaml"): ---> 56 return cfg_from_file(filename) 57 /home/dlc/anaconda3/envs/dlc/lib/python3.6/site-packages/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_tensorflow/config.py in cfg_from_file(filename) 41 """ ---> 42 with open(filename, 'r') as f: 43 yaml_cfg = edict(yaml.load(f,Loader=yaml.SafeLoader)) FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/media/dlc/Data/DLC/test-shohei-2019-11-28/dlc-models/iteration-1/testNov28-trainset95shuffle1/test/pose_cfg.yaml' During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred: FileNotFoundError Traceback (most recent call last) in () ----> 1 deeplabcut.analyze_videos(config_path,['/media/dlc/Data/Data/TurtleBehavData/E09/HV_Grating/2012.06.22-E09-avi'], shuffle=1, save_as_csv=True, videotype='.avi') /home/dlc/anaconda3/envs/dlc/lib/python3.6/site-packages/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_tensorflow/predict_videos.py in analyze_videos(config, videos, videotype, shuffle, trainingsetindex, gputouse, save_as_csv, destfolder, cropping) 130 dlc_cfg = load_config(str(path_test_config)) 131 except FileNotFoundError: --> 132 raise FileNotFoundError("It seems the model for shuffle %s and trainFraction %s does not exist."%(shuffle,trainFraction)) 133 134 # Check which snapshots are available and sort them by # iterations FileNotFoundError: It seems the model for shuffle 1 and trainFraction 0.95 does not exist.
